content: dalekanium pattern directions are written for using magic loop toe up with a star toe mini-gussett and garter stitch short row heel supplies approx 3 5-4 oz 500 yds of fingering weight yarn circular needles approx 40 in long or longer size 1 or size needed to achieve gauge 4 stitchmarkers 2 stitch holders if using magic loop two at a time gauge 9 sts per inch in stockinette stitch stitches k p k2tog p2tog m1r m1l m1p sl pm unless otherwise stated work all slip stitches purlwise with yarn in back the long slipped stitches are worked on double wrapped stitches insert needle knitwise into stitch indicated and wrap the needle two times before pulling through sizing s m l finished foot circumference 6 6 7 5 8 4 inches unstretched choose the size that is slightly smaller than your actual measurement to allow some negative ease it is recommended to knit the socks to a finished length of approxamately ½ inch shorter than actual foot measurement a note on fit the long slipped stitches do not have much affect on sizing as they are only knit once every 4 row if you wish to make adaptations to the pattern for a better fit just remember that you need a multiple of 4 stitches before you add in the m1r s with double wraps to begin the pattern stitch portion of the sock before round 3 cast on cast on 8 10 10 stitches on both needles using judy s magic cast on 16 20 20 sts total http //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html note first half of stitches top needle is the instep second half second half is the sole copyright 2011 by dena stelly www littlemonkeysstitchnspin com toe 1 *k1 pm k 4 5 5 pm k3 4 4 * repeat from * to * on sole needle 2 k around 3 k to marker m1r sl marker repeat around alternate rounds 2 and 3 increasing until you have 30 34 38 stitches on each needle 60 68 76 total stitches on each sock end with round 3 leaving the last stitch on the sole needle unworked move one stitch from both sides of the sole needle up to the instep needle 28 32 36 sole stitches 32 36 40 instep stitches remove markers as you work the next round foot 4 k2 *m1r wrapping needle twice before pulling through k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times slip next stitch dropping second wrap off the needle k2 k all sole stitches 6 k2 *sl1 k4* repeat from * to * 6 7 8 more times sl1 k2 k all sole stitches 7 repeat
